param.name: artist
param.doc: The artist name. Required unless mbid.

param.name: album
param.doc: The artist name. Required unless mbid.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The musicbrainz id for the album.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: country
param.doc: A country name, as defined by the ISO 3166-1 country names standard.

param.name: artist
param.doc: The artist name. Required unless mbid.

param.name: album
param.doc: The album name. Required unless mbid.

param.name: mbid
param.doc: The musicbrainz id for the album.

param.name: autocorrect
param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: username
param.doc: The username for the context of the request. If supplied, the user's playcount for this artist is included in the response.

param.name: lang
param.doc: The language to return the biography in, expressed as an ISO 639 alpha-2 code.

param.doc: The artist name. Required unless mbid.

param.name: mbid

param.name: limit
param.doc: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

param.doc: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.
